meanings.sent1: After opening the gift, she decided to rewrap it with a different paper.
meanings.sent2: I need to rewrap this sandwich because the paper tore.
meanings.sent3: He tried to rewrap the present, but the cat kept playing with the wrapping paper.
meanings.sent4: The idea of rewrapping memories in colorful paper made her smile.
meanings.sent5: Remember to rewrap the leftovers to keep them fresh.

meanings.sent1: She had to rewrap the book in shiny paper for the book club exchange.
meanings.sent2: The florist will rewrap the bouquet before delivering it to the recipient.
meanings.sent3: The magician attempted to rewrap the disappearing rabbit in a different cloth.
meanings.sent4: The storm rewrapped the landscape in a blanket of snow overnight.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to rewrap the fragile vase before moving it.

meanings.sent1: The company had to rewrap the damaged products before shipping them out.
meanings.sent2: Please rewrap the items in bubble wrap to protect them during transit.
meanings.sent3: The elves had to rewrap the toys after the mischievous kitten got into them.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to rewrap the memories of childhood in a nostalgic glow.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to rewrap the box securely with tape.
